Actions.Name: Add registrant
Actions.Description: Registers one person, identified by a unique email address, for a webinar.

Actions.Name: Get Registrant
Actions.Description: Retrieves details of a specific registrant in a webinar.

Actions.Name: Get webinar
Actions.Description: Retrieves all information about a scheduled webinar.

Actions.Name: List registrants
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all registrants for a specific webinar.

Actions.Name: List Webinars
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all webinars for the authenticated user.

Actions.Name: When a registrant is added
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new registrant is added to a webinar.

Actions.Name: When a webinar is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new webinar is created.
